title: Release notes visibility & automated versioning
highlights: New What's New panel that summarizes feature updates per deployment.
Release versioning now comes from app-version.json and is reused for Docker tags.
items: Track the last version each user has acknowledged and only show newer updates.
Add scripts to bump major/minor versions for features and fixes.

title: Initial release
highlights: Launch RetroGemini with retrospectives and health checks.
items: Core collaboration features, templates, and Docker deployment.
